key_features: Three major settings sections: User Profile, Notifications, Preferences
Toggle switches for notification and preference settings
Responsive grid layout for form fields

patterns_discovered.description: Settings grouped into logical Card components with icon headers, descriptions, and internal Dividers for visual separation
Colored icon box paired with Typography heading and subtitle for section identification
FormControlLabel with Switch component for boolean settings with descriptive labels
Two-column grid layout that collapses to single column on mobile
Cancel and Save buttons aligned to the right with flex gap spacing

gotchas_discovered.description: Form fields contain hardcoded default values (John Doe, john.doe@example.com, etc.) that should be fetched from user data or props
gotchas_discovered.impact: Component is not reusable across different users without modification

gotchas_discovered.description: Only emailNotifications, pushNotifications, and darkMode have state management; other toggle switches use defaultChecked without state hooks
gotchas_discovered.location: Meeting Reminders, Approval Notifications, Compact View, Auto-save Drafts switches
gotchas_discovered.impact: Some settings won't be saved on form submission or when component re-renders

gotchas_discovered.description: Save Changes button has no onClick handler or form submission logic
gotchas_discovered.impact: Changes to settings will not be persisted to backend or local storage

gotchas_discovered.description: Email and phone number fields lack validation despite having specific input types
gotchas_discovered.location: Email Address and Phone Number TextFields

gotchas_discovered.description: No loading indicator or success message when saving changes
gotchas_discovered.impact: Poor user feedback during save operations

deliverables: Fully functional React component with TypeScript
Three main settings sections with proper structure
Responsive layout using MUI Grid system
Toggle switches for notification and preference management
Profile editing form with multiple input fields

recommendations.recommendation: Implement complete state management for all toggle switches and form fields
recommendations.rationale: Current implementation only manages 3 of 7 toggle switches, making the component incomplete

recommendations.recommendation: Add onClick handler to Save Changes button to persist settings to backend/localStorage
recommendations.rationale: Without this, users cannot actually save their preferences

recommendations.recommendation: Replace hardcoded default values with props or API call to fetch current user data
recommendations.rationale: Component should display actual user information, not placeholder data

recommendations.recommendation: Add form validation for email and phone number fields
recommendations.rationale: Prevents invalid data submission and improves data quality

recommendations.recommendation: Add loading state to Save button and success/error toast notifications
recommendations.rationale: Provides clear feedback during async operations

recommendations.recommendation: Extract repeated section headers and toggle patterns into reusable sub-components
recommendations.rationale: Reduces code duplication and improves maintainability

recommendations.recommendation: Ensure form labels are properly associated with inputs and ARIA labels are present on icon-only elements
recommendations.rationale: Improves accessibility for screen reader users
